title: FULLY FURNISHED SUN FILLED ONE BED
posting_body: 1 bedroom condo available for lease in brick walk up on Columbus Ave in Boston's South End neighborhood.
Unit is fully furnished and features wood floors, efficiency kitchen with granite counters and stainless steel appliances, A/C.
Call or Text Michela Nionakis at 617-939-7425 for an immediate response!
